description: A farm with rooms, a spa, a bistro and a gourmet restaurant! At the latter, enjoy regional cuisine with a creative twist added by the chef, on two tasting menus that can be modified as required. ...
facilitiesServices: Air conditioning, Car park, Garden or park, Great view, Terrace, Wheelchair access
creditCards: American Express credit card, Credit card / Debit card accepted, Mastercard credit card, Visa credit card
